events.title: Events
events.description: With over 10 years of experience successfully organizing numerous programs and projects both domestically and internationally, Blue Agency takes pride in being the right choice, a reliable companion in creating professional events that elevate the brand for our partner's businesses

content1.title: Trung Quân and Friends – Trót Yêu in Hue & Da Nang 2019
content1.description: The first live show in his career titled “Trót Yêu” by Trung Quân has brought thousands of audience members to tears. Not only did he perform his iconic hit songs, but Trung Quân and his friends Ái Phương, Khổng Tú Quỳnh, Đào Bá Lộc, Đạt G, Hoàng Tôn, Hằng Bingboong, Phương Anh Idol, and Huỳnh Tú also shared many interesting stories about their friendship.

content2.title: The 11th VIPHAVET PLATINUM Club meeting
content2.description: The VIPHAVET Platinum Club meeting is an event organized by Viphavet twice a year starting from 2014 and exclusively reserved for the company's top distributors. The event serves as a token of appreciation from Viphavet to our esteemed customers who have accompanied us throughout this journey. In addition to providing new knowledge and soft skills training programs, particularly exclusive promotions for club members, VIPHAVET Platinum also serves as a platform for customers to meet, network, and enjoy vacations at luxury hotels and resorts.

content3.title: Cynosure Apac Summit 2023 in Singapore
content3.description: Cynosure Apac Summit 2023 in Singapore is an event series where Blue Agency - Events & Media was fortunate to contribute efforts from conceptualization to design and execution.

content4.title: Grand Opening
content4.description: The Grand Opening is one of the crucial and indispensable events for every business. Organizing an opening ceremony carries positive significance, marking the auspicious beginning and future success of the business. Additionally, the opening event serves as a powerful communication tool, enabling businesses to reach customers quickly and introduce and promote products, as well as seek potential customers. It is precisely because of these significances that organizing a Grand Opening is increasingly chosen by many businesses to invest in systematically and meticulously, aiming to introduce the company's image and assert its position in the market.

content5.title: Seminar
content5.description: A seminar is a corporate event held annually with the purpose of maintaining current customer relationships and attracting potential customers. Key activities in the seminar include discussions on practical issues, dialogue, customer opinion surveys, or sharing industry knowledge. Organizing a seminar provides an opportunity for businesses to meet and interact with partners, enhance relationships with the media, and improve the company's image.

content6.title: Production and rental services event equipment
content6.description: We specialize in providing full event equipment rental services. With many years of experience and the same principle “Professional - Dedicated - Creative”.

content7.description: In modern marketing, conducting roadshows is one of the familiar communication methods adopted by many brands in various promotional campaigns for brand awareness, products, services, or special events.

media.title: Media
media.description: With the philosophy of “Bringing the Best Products to Customers”, Blue Agency invests heavily in state-of-the-art equipment and a top-notch team in the film production industry, aiming to provide customers with impressive and unique advertising videos/images that contribute to the success of their marketing campaigns

content1.title: Image production enterprise & products
content1.description: With experience in image production and product photography in many different industries and fields, we can provide the best and most suitable advice for your brand.

content2.title: Event image production
content2.description: With a professional & creative team, we will advise and execute event videos with all budget sizes, ensuring the best image quality, capturing impressive moments at the event. of business.

content3.title: Marketing video production
content3.description: We specialize in providing professional marketing video production services for businesses, helping to develop script ideas, pre-production filming, post-production editing, and video distribution for optimal effectiveness.

design.title: Design
design.description: Event design encompasses activities related to designing, organizing, and executing events. Planning the theme, constructing, and implementing events help attract more participants, increase brand awareness, and promote products and services according to the organizer's objectives.
